numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows clean electricity generation.
2. Clean electricity generation is the most used type of electricity generation in the world.
3. Clean electricity generation has led since the year 2000.
6. Coal is one of the two lowest used types of electricity generation in the world.
7. Gas is one of the two lowest used types of electricity generation in the world.
8. I wonder about the history behind this graph.
9. I ask whether the growth of the types of electricity generation in this graph can be modeled by a linear model.
10. I ask whether there was a time when coal led electricity generation.
11. I ask whether there was a time when gas led electricity generation.
12. This graph relates to my community.
13. As I grow older, technology becomes more engraved in human life.
14. If technology becomes more engraved in human life, then electricity consumption increases.
15. A high use of clean electricity generation can help save the environment.
16. Fossil-fuel electricity generation has negative side effects.
17. The headline is: Is the world's electricity clean or dirty?
